skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Homeschool Christian Mom, hosted by Elizabeth Estelle from Homeschool Christian Mom.
The goal of this show is to support the work you do each and every day in your homeschool with practical teaching tips, scheduling strategies, meal planning helps, Biblical reminders and words of encouragement. 

I am excited to help you make today extra great!

In less than 2 minutes, you can grab practical tips to try out in your homeschool today. 

You have a cheerleader and it's me!

Let me help you have the homeschool that you have envisioned. 

Get the support you need.

Find out more at homeschoolchristianmom.com

Facebook Page: Homeschool Christian Mom

Private Client Consultations Available https://calendly.com/homeschoolchristianmom
